DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the EUS registry is to record information about Endoscopic Ultrasound (EUS) on the management of gastrointestinal disease. The registry will evaluate efficacy, safety and technical success of the Endoscopic Ultrasound (EUS). Design is retrospective and prospective registry study.
DOC.brief_title: EUS for Gastrointestinal Disorders: a Registry
DOC.criteria: All patients submitted to EUS, Informed consent. Age less than 18 y Patient who did not give the consent to the processing of personal data.
